aboutTitle: Full-stack web developer in React, Typescript, MongoDb, Nodejs and Javascript
about1: I am originally from Buenos Aires, Argentina. Years of university education and my fluency in languages (mainly English and French), have allowed me to develop excellent problem-solving skills.
about2: I am currently building projects with
about2bis: and I strive daily to acquire new technical knowledge to help solve day-to-day problems individuals and companies may encounter.
about3: I love learning and everyday I take steps towards self-improvement. If you have an idea or project you would like to bring to life, feel free to contact me.

dataprojects.descripcion: Fragrance e-shop developed for a client. Admin dashboard to upload and edit products. Checkout and payment flow (Mercado Pago). JWT authentication, Redux state management and Mongodb index search.

Replica of the famous site with real-time socket notifications. Upon registration, users have access to a public area where they can post messages, and an additional private route where they can view and edit their user info.
Portfolio that I originally built with pure Javascript and that I later translated into React. I used the Intersection Observer API, and translated the content with the help of React-i18n.
